description: Try our easy to follow Classic Creamy Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Mayonnaise,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Classic Creamy Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the egg yolks, vinegar, and mustard in a food processor. Process for about 1 minute, until pale and creamy. (Or whisk by hand.)
With the machine running, slowly pour in the oil through the feed tube in a thin, steady stream, processing until the mayonnaise is thick and creamy. (If making by hand, dribble in the oil.)
Add the lemon juice and pulse briefly (or stir) to combine. Season with salt and pepper.
